title: No COLA for 2016 Will Affect Medicare Premiums and Social Security Finances (Center on Budget ...
text: ( Source : Center on Budget and Policy Priorities) The Social Security Administration 's announcement that there will be no cost-of-living adjustment ( COLA ) for Social Security beneficiaries next year due to declining prices raises important
